Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

ThegetViewerPose()method, a member of the XRFrame interface, returns a XRViewerPose object which describes the viewer's pose (position and orientation) relative to the specified reference space.

See thegetPose() method for a way to calculate a pose that represents the difference between two spaces.
